statements: UPDATE jokes SET joke_text='A day without sunshine is like, night.', writer_name='Unknown' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE jokes SET submission_date='2022-02-21 10:00:00' WHERE writer_name='John Doe';
UPDATE jokes SET writer_name = 'John Doe', submission_date = '2021-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE jokes SET joke_text = 'Why did the mathematician break up with his girlfriend? Because she was too mean.', submission_date = '2021-10-17 14:45:00', writer_name = 'Alice Smith' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE jokes SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ideas SET category = 'Technology' WHERE author = 'Alice';
UPDATE jokes SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE ideas SET category = 'Technology', idea_text = 'New AI algorithm' WHERE author = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Writer SET writer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE writer_id = 1;
UPDATE Jokes SET joke_text = 'Why did the chicken cross the road?' WHERE joke_id = 2;
UPDATE Jokes SET joke_text = 'Why do we tell actors to 'break a leg'? Because every play has a cast.', writer_id = 3 WHERE joke_id = 1;
UPDATE Ideas SET idea_description = 'Inventing a new language for your story can add depth and interest.', writer_id = 2 WHERE idea_id = 5;
UPDATE Jokes SET author_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Ideas SET idea_description = 'New idea!' WHERE author_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE Jokes SET joke_content = 'Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems.', author_name = 'Anonymous' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Ideas SET author_name = 'Creative Mind', idea_description = 'A revolutionary idea that will change the world.' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE jokes SET author_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE joke_ratings SET rating = 5, rater_name = 'Alice' WHERE joke_id = 2;
UPDATE jokes SET joke_text = 'Why did the skeleton go to the party alone?', author_name = 'Anonymous Jokester' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE joke_comments SET comment_text = 'Hilarious joke, loved it!', commenter_name = 'JokeExpert', date_posted = '2022-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE joke_id = 2;
